db:info.db:title: Qt QML Models experimental QML Types

db:abstract.db:para: Provides QML experimental types for data models.
This module was introduced in Qt 5.12.

db:article.db:para: This module was introduced in Qt 5.12.
This QML module contains experimental QML types related to data models.
